## Editable examples

















::: {.cell}
```{webr}
plot(rnorm(1000))
```
:::

















## Scrollable output

















::: {.cell}
```{webr}
mod <- lm(mpg ~ cyl, data = mtcars)
plot(mod)
summary(mod)
```
:::

















## Read Only

















::: {.cell edit='false'}
```{webr}
#| edit: false
mod <- lm(mpg ~ cyl, data = mtcars)
summary(mod)
```
:::

















## Exercises

















::: {.cell exercise='ex1' caption='Exercise 1'}
```{webr}
#| exercise: ex1
#| caption: Exercise 1
1 + 2 + 3 + ______
```
:::

::: {.cell exercise='ex1' check='true'}
```{webr}
#| exercise: ex1
#| check: true
if (.result == 10) {
  list(message = "Great work!", correct = TRUE)
} else {
  list(message = "That's incorrect.", correct = FALSE)
}
```
:::

















::: { .hint exercise="ex1" }

You should make the expression sum to 10.

:::

::: { .solution exercise="ex1" }

**Solution:**

```r
1 + 2 + 3 + 4
```

:::
